description: Japanese cuisine served in a small restaurant where both the cuisine and decor are minimalist in style. Here, young chef Satoshi Hazama creates light dishes full of Japanese flavour, all made from top-quality ingredients. The kaiseki menu served in the evening consists of seven or nine different courses.
